TopicTitle: New to forum,not in the game

Articles.Content:
Still cant make a plane though,I can make rockets and crazy stuff.

![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

I've been playing for 3 years, and I still suck at planes. 

Welcome to the forum. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome Nathaniel411! My space program lives mostly off of rockets as well. Even when I do build a functioning plane, I'm so bad at flying it that I have no way of telling if it's actually any good ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Anyway, happy launching!

Yeah, planes are really a pain... But I hope you have fun playing and have a good time on the forum ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

By the way, this is a really good guide on the forum for aircraft building, it sure as heck helped me! (It's also EXTREMELY simple! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)): [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29896-How-to-Make-a-Perfect-Space-Plane](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29896-How-to-Make-a-Perfect-Space-Plane)
Thank you everyone!Also,Im a good pilot and most of the time,I BD Armory the hell out of other peoples planes XD
btw,I cant see a button to add a profile pic ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
You should be able to access your profile now. You were in the Curious George user group (a spam prevention measure), so you weren't able to access some features, particularly profile settings.
